Thanks Jon. It is extremely precise - I woke up at 6.04 AM and start downloading, even before first cup of coffee. Then - encoding. From 10:00 AM. Roughly at 2 RealTime speed for one pass. Multiplying that with two (number of passes) and with number of shows on specific day (today is definitely busiest day of week) gives a time to the point when I have finished with encoding. Then the upload to seeding sever - roughly 52 minutes for average show. So, one could multiply 52 minutes with number of shows. Add that to time for download of sources plus encoding time. 
It is wise to include at least minus-plus 60 minutes for occasional fuck-ups, as today, when FTP server decided to do  reset at 98% of The Mentalist upload.

Anyone can do the math.

Are out there miracles? Absolutely. I perform one each and every day. For few Thanks.
